commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: It's finally starting.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah. The heat coming off of everyone is making the venue pretty hot.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Yes, I can feel my own body heating up as well.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Oh, I just remembered! I met Kaoruko when I went to check out the venue.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: You met with...Kaoruko?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You know her, right? She said she was looking for you.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Is that so? So she really did come.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: How do you know Kaoâ€”

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Oh, the show's starting.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Ah, right!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Hi everyone! We're the Nijigasaki High School Idol Club!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Hm? Are you wondering where Î¼'s and Aqours are?

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Don't worry, they're both here with us! We're all gonna dance together!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Our club was only formed just recently, so we're nowhere near reaching the heights of Î¼'s or Aqours, but our passion for this event rivals theirs.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: So please watch us closely and see for yourself, okay?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: We're full of determination. Rina-chan Board says, "Serious!"

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: We'll do our very best!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I'm sure you'll all be swooning over how cute I am by the time we're done with our opening act!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: I won't go as far as to say that, but I hope you'll at least remember our names!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: All right! Are you ready to get into the festival spirit? The School Idol Festival begins now!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: What an incredible roaring cheer!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: The event's only just begun and I'm already overwhelmed with emotions. I'm...so happy... That's all I can say right now.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I'm so happy for you. Congratulations.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: We have everyone, all the volunteers, and you to thank for this as well, Shioriko. Thank you.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I really didn't do much.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Oh, but you did. It's almost as if we overcame everything because you stepped in to help run the event.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You organized the event summary and applications to submit to the school and took on all kinds of other jobs, too. We wouldn't be here without your support.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I was the one who said I would help if you managed to gather enough volunteers, so I haven't done anything to warrant any sort of thanks.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You have definitely earned my gratitude. We wouldn't have been able to hold the School Idol Festival today if it wasn't for you. That much I can say for sure.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: You helped me out during the school tour, so please just see this as me returning the favor.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: If that's what you want me to do...

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: That is exactly what I wish for you to do. Please.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: However, I must say, for the School Idol Festival to actually be held today is nothing short of a miracle.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: What?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I thought it would be near impossible to gather 1,000 volunteers.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I didn't think it would be possible to find such numbers through mere talk of dreams and passion alone.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Shioriko...

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: But Uehara's dreams and emotions created a huge wave through her live stream and found their way to school idol fans all over Japan. That's what made it a reality.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I see that emotions...that one's heart, is important to move the hearts of others.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: People aren't machines. No matter how often I push the agenda of logic, I cannot move the hearts of others. That is what I have learned.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Was your heart moved as well, Shioriko?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Yes. I was touched and felt a passion brewing inside of me. That is what made me truly want to take on this challenge with you and make this event a success.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Really? I guess everyone would think that way after hearing that live stream of Ayumu's. She really captured everyone's hearts.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Indeed. It also felt as if I received a swift punch to the head as well.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Huh?! Wh-What do you mean by that?!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: *Chuckle* It's nothing to get so surprised about.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I realized that as I am right now, I don't have the ability to emotionally impact others in the way that she did.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: School idols who can move the hearts of others are amazing. That is what a true school idol is.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah, school idols really are incredible. They shine so brightly, and bring energy and excitement to others.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: That's right.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You know what? Personally, I wanted you to take the stage as well.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I mean, you only joined the club temporarily, yet you stayed as late as you could to practice and learned how to dance.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: What?! Such nonsense coming out of your mouth! Impossible! I would only be a burden on others with my extremely limited practice.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Only those who have sweat their hearts out and tried their best without waning deserve to stand on that big stage. Someone like me does not belong there.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: We will be holding lots of different events with many school idols after this as well!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: There will be live shows, games, and many other events to suit the interests of all!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: These events will be held all around the school, so grab that map you got at the entrance and go exploring!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: We've also got a jam-packed food corner so I highly recommend going on a little food tour as well!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: I had a taste myself and was surprised by how delicious everything was!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Make sure you follow the rules and enjoy yourselves!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Okay, we're all gonna step off stage for now, but we'll be seeing you all again real soon!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Oh! While we're all here, I wanna say our slogan together with everyone!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: The slogan's important! Rina-chan Board says, "Sparkle."

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: All right, here we go! Come Together!

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Dream Together!
